title: WaveSpeed AI - Smart Auto Tagging for Effortless Organization

hero.heading: Effortlessly Tag Your Images
hero.description: Automatically generate tags for your photos, streamlining your organization process.

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Auto tag the scenery, identify people in the photo...

examples.heading: Auto Tagging Examples
examples.description: Discover how our AI can enhance your photo organization through smart tagging.

items.title: Tagging Landscapes
items.description: Automatically assign relevant tags to scenic images for easy categorization.

items.title: Identifying People
items.description: Instinctively identify and tag individuals in group photos for enhanced organization.

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Our state-of-the-art technology streamlines your tagging process with precision.

items.title: Instant Tagging
items.description: Receive accurate tags within seconds, saving you time and effort.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: No expertise needed. Simply upload your image and watch the AI tag it seamlessly.

items.title: Data Privacy Assured
items.description: Your images are tagged locally, ensuring complete privacy and security.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Just three simple steps to smarter photo management

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Easily upload your photo by dragging, dropping, or browsing files. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Tagging
items.description: Our advanced AI efficiently analyzes your image and generates relevant tags based on its content.

items.title: Review and Download
items.description: View the generated tags and download your organized image with ease.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless satisfied users who streamline their photo organization with our smart tagging solution

items.name: Emma Brown
items.comment: The auto tagging feature has transformed how I manage my photos! I can find them in seconds.

items.name: David Smith
items.comment: As a photographer, this tagging service has saved me hours in organizing my portfolio.

items.name: Linda Wilson
items.comment: I love that my images are processed without leaving my device. Such peace of mind!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your common queries about our auto tagging feature

items.title: What types of tags can the AI generate?
items.description: The AI can create a variety of tags based on the image content, including categories for scenery, people, objects, and colors.

items.title: Is there a limit to the number of images I can tag?
items.description: No, you can tag as many images as you want! Each user gets 30 free credits daily, ensuring ample access.

items.title: Can I use tagged content for commercial purposes?
items.description: Yes! Users with a paid subscription can utilize tagged images for commercial endeavors. Free-tier users may only use them for personal projects.

items.title: How does the system ensure my privacy?
items.description: All tagging is performed directly in your browser, meaning your images are never uploaded or stored on external servers.

footer.heading: Ready to Revolutionize Your Photo Organization?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience effortless tagging. No sign-up required.
